sea shape [watershape]: â‡” #2392 Aphroi Hierophant

(sacred [holy], lance-ok [lanceok], amphibious [amphibian], recuperation [heal])

magic paths [mpath]: H1 U1 R7
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc
The Aphroi are ichtycentaurs of pure blood. They are marked by their creator with lobster claws on their brows, a sure sign of divine heritage. All Aphroi receive special status in Oceania and many are trained as hierophants, chanting priests. Hierophants have some skills in Nature or Water magic.
